attributes.action: Increase/Double Minimum Wage for low-paid key workers during COVID-19 Crisis
attributes.additional_details: The struggle of low-paid key workers can be discriminating if they are forced to risk their life to receive an earning they depend on. Please debate and authorise an increase of minimum wage for duration of the COVID-19 crisis for low-paid key workers. Low-paid NHS staff, any kind of courier drivers, carers, cleaners, supermarkets shelf stackers, cashiers, and all the frontline low-paid staff who would risk their life to fight for this country shall deserve more. Think of those people please.
attributes.background: This is a petition to UK-government to debate and authorise to Increase or Double the minimum wage paid to low-paid key workers during the Coronavirus (COVID-19) Crisis. They are risking their life by putting themselves on the forefront of providing the public to fight the coronavirus outbreak.

rejection.details:

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
